title: 28 Nordstrom Black Friday Clothing Deals Worth Adding To Cart
description: The hustle and bustle (and, let’s face it, stress) of Black Friday shopping can make it tough to zero in on what’s actually worth adding to your cart. That’s where we come in — to guide you through the chaos and spotlight the best Black Friday clothing deals. And if you’re a die-hard Nordstrom shopper (as many of our R29 readers are), you’ll love our curated roundup of the very best fashion finds on sale this year.Right now, Nordstrom’s Early Black Friday Deals are live, running from November 15 to 20, with up to 70% off select women’s clothing. We’ve scoured the sale section to bring you our top picks, from cutesy cardigans (up to 40% off Free People sweaters!), holiday-ready tops, and trendy jackets to fan-favorites like the Skims lounge dress, as well as bold outerwear (hello, scarf coat) and must-have denim (key Frame jeans are 33% off, for one). Heads up: Some items are available in limited colorways and sizes, so we recommend adding your favorites to your cart stat. And don’t forget to bookmark this page — once Nordstrom’s official Black Friday (November 21 to 29) and Cyber Monday (November 30 to December 1) sales kick off, we’ll be updating our edit with even more editor-approved pieces. Whether you’re on the hunt for the perfect fashion gift, upgrading your winter wardrobe, or snagging those trusty basics, we’ve got you covered throughout the mega-sale season.At Refinery29, we’re here to help you navigate this overwhelming world of stuff. All of our market picks are independently selected and curated by the editorial team.
